alert.note: Alert for Northern Cayuga; Oswego; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 8:50AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF OSWEGO AND FAR NORTHERN PORTIONS OF WAYNE AND CAYUGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. This band of heavy snow is producing heavy snow at the rate of 1 to 2 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 849 AM EDT, a band of heavy snow was over Battle Island State Park, or near Fulton. The heavy snow band was nearly stationary. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Oswego, Fulton, Fair Haven Beach State Park, Central Square, Battle Island State Park, Hastings, Scriba, Volney, Constantia, West Monroe, Palermo, Sterling, Phoenix, Ira, Minetto, Mexico, Cleveland, Hannibal, Red Creek and Parish. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 32 and 33. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
